outputInfo.description: S3 url of the uploaded file
outputInfo.label: S3 url

arguments.label: Filepath on a local FS
arguments.description: File path on a local file system

arguments.label: S3 bucket name
arguments.description: The bucket name on S3. If empty, the default bucket assigned to the sagemaker session is used.

arguments.label: Filepath on S3
arguments.description: The filepath on S3, under the root bucket. If missing, the source file base name will be used.

arguments.label: Skip file uploading (Test)
arguments.description: If set, then assume the file was already uploaded and exists at the target!
